install.name: Ninjaboard Posts
install.author: NinjaForge
install.copyright: (C) 2007-2010 Ninja Media Group. All rights reserved.
install.description: Renders latest posts with the same look and feel like the regular component list

changelogs.state: First Release Initial beta version release of Ninjaboard Posts module.

param.name: collapse_content
param.label: Collapse Post Content
param.description: This will hide the actual post content of each post to keep the display cleaner, and use a toggle on the frontend for users to display or hide the post content. Setting this option to 'No' will show the post content without the toggle ability.

param.name: display_avatar
param.label: Display Avatar
param.description: Option to display the users avatar in the post content.

param.name: posts_num
param.label: Number of Posts to Display
param.description: Sets how many posts will be displayed in the module.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
